name: Explosive Finale
description: You deal 20 damage. Plus, your opponent suffers 5 damage for each successive card played by you or your opponent this turn.

immediateEffect.script: int baseDamage = 20; int bonusDamage = Battle.CardsPlayedThisTurn * 5; int totalDamage = baseDamage + bonusDamage; DealDamage(Opponent, totalDamage);
